thread.title: Kubisys Joins Dynamics AX User Group as Premium Member, Will Present at AXUG Summit on October 16
thread.title_full: Kubisys Joins Dynamics AX User Group as Premium Member, Will Present at AXUG Summit on October 16

author: admin
title: Kubisys Joins Dynamics AX User Group as Premium Member, Will Present at AXUG Summit on October 16
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/14/2015 @ 3:54 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Kubisys 
POMPTON LAKES, N.J., Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- AXUG is an independent group of Microsoft Dynamics AX software users, partners, industry experts and representatives of Microsoft Corp. AXUG is recognized by Microsoft as the official user group for its Dynamics AX business software. Kubisys' participation in AXUG demonstrates its commitment to the Microsoft Dynamics AX community and provides the organization with new ways to share its expertise. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/276731 
"All of us at Kubisys are thrilled to join AXUG," said EJ Harof, Global MSFT Partner Manager. "We're excited to share our seven years of providing an innovative test environment solution with other Dynamics AX partners and help today's businesses thrive by realizing the full array of benefits Dynamics AX provides." 
For their official AXUG debut, Kubisys is proud to be presenting at the AXUG Summit on Friday, Oct. 16 at 1:00 p.m. in Reno, NV. Kubisys will also be available at Booth #679 during the conference (Oct. 13-16) to answer attendees' questions and showcase the Kubisys Platform's wide capabilities. 
"Our Premium Partner members are an integral part of the AXUG community. They bring innovative solutions, strategies and expertise to the group, which is of immense value to our members," said Frank Vukovits, AXUG Director. "AXUG will work hand-in-hand with Kubisys to increase the value of the community by offering Dynamics AX users many useful benefits. We're pleased to welcome Kubisys, and we look forward to their contributions to AXUG." 
ABOUT KUBISYS: 
Kubisys is an independent software and hardware vendor that automates the process of creating production-accurate test environments for any Windows application (AX, CRM, SAP, SharePoint, etc). Within minutes, users can spin-up a test environment that contains the same configurations (IP/MAC) as production. Each test environment resides within an isolated network and can include any Windows physical or virtual server. End users eliminate manual tasks associated with building dev/test environments while partners ensure that applications are implemented without downtime. Founded in 2007, Kubisys was named a "Cool Vendor in DevOps in 2013" by Gartner Research Group. 
ABOUT AXUG: 
The Dynamics AX User Group (AXUG) is an independent, user-driven organization that helps individuals and company members maximize the value they receive from Microsoft Dynamics AX. Members learn, network and share expertise through educational events, webinars, training courses, virtual collaborative meetings, regional networking opportunities and a vibrant online community. Established in 2004, AXUG is approximately 3,000 organizations strong and dedicated to creating deep, intimate learning opportunities for their members. 
Media Contact: Menoa Keshishi, KUBISYS, 770-317-3757, keshishi@kubisys.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Kubisys
